description: Creates a new storage configuration, used to enable recording to Amazon S3. When a StorageConfiguration is created, IVS will modify the S3 bucketPolicy of the provided bucket. This will ensure that IVS has sufficient permissions to write content to the provided bucket.

parameters.name: s3
parameters.description: A complex type that contains a storage configuration for where recorded video will be stored. Location (S3 bucket name) where recorded videos will be stored. Note that the StorageConfiguration and S3 bucket must be in the same region as the Composition.

nested_params.name: bucketName
nested_params.description: where recorded videos will be stored. Note that the StorageConfiguration and S3 bucket must be in the same region as the Composition.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: Tags attached to the resource. Array of maps, each of the form string:string (key:value). See Best practices and strategies in Tagging AWS Resources and Tag Editor for details, including restrictions that apply to tags and 'Tag naming limits and requirements'; Amazon IVS has no constraints on tags beyond what is documented there. (string) --- (string) ---

nested_items.name: bucketName
nested_items.description: where recorded videos will be stored. Note that the StorageConfiguration and S3 bucket must be in the same region as the Composition.
